name: mikroe.click.adc22
short_description: ADC 22 Click is a compact add-on board with a high-performance data converter. This board features the ADS8665, a high-speed single-supply SAR ADC data acquisition system with programmable bipolar input ranges from Texas Instruments. It features a high-speed, high-precision A/D converter based on successive approximation (SAR). This 12-bit resolution ADC with an integrated analog front-end (AFE) input driver circuit can achieve speeds of up to 500ksps.
